item.title: Cape emotes
item.dc:creator: @TranScape TranScape
item.description:
@TranScape wrote:

public void capeEmote() {
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14073) { //attack
stillgfx(346, absY, absX);
stillgfx(427, absY, absX);
stillgfx(83, absY, absX);
setAnimation(2890);

playerLevel[0] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]);
playerLevel[0] += 1;
sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[0]+"", 4016);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

   }

}

i got that i need to make a command like ::scemote and it does emote i dont got anything in emote box tho

if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14073) { //attack
stillgfx(346, absY, absX);

playerLevel[0] += 1;
sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[0]+"", 4016);
